p: The aqueous leaf extract of M. balsamina has also been used to minimize and relieve period pain in young girls and postnatal women used it to stimulate milk production ( Tan et al., 2008). In Hausa land of Nigeria and Republic of Niger, the leaves are cooked as part of green vegetables soup for post-natal women, where it is believed to help the mother to restore her lost blood during labor and to cleanse her breast milk ( Molehin and Adefegha, 2014).
